item.title: Best security practices for WordPress installations
item.description: If you want to set up your own website but you are not an expert, you may have seen the word “Wordpress” spread. It is a CMS (Content Management System) to help in the the creation of a website. Basically, it facilitates creation and management by providing a ready-to-use interface. Now all you have to do is customize your site and write your articles! No need to write code (even if it is possible to search and modify manually) !
